entry.title: The Carry-On Roller in Grey
entry.summary:
Vendor: Beach House Group
Type: Luggage
Price: 198.00

Description

The security line is a breeze with our carry-on-friendly roller, 360* smooth-rolling wheels make getting where you're going absolutely effortless. A trolley handle with a cushioned, silicone grip to ensure your hand never feels the stress of travel and an interior that expands an extra two inches, so wherever you go, you can bring a little something back (even if it is just a tan)! Béis Limited Lifetime Luggage Warranty included.
Specifications

Dims: 14"W x 9"D x 22"H
Material: Polycarbonate PVC Polyester Nylon Zipper Hardware
Care: Spot Clean
Weight: 8.36lbs
Details

EXTERIOR
durable hard sided 100% virgin PolyCarbonate (virgin materials guarantee a higher durability)
gradient 3D stripe design
Hinomoto 360 degree wheels
extendable BÉIS logo-ed ( lengths ) (contrast on black) trolley handle with soft hand cushion for comfort
BÉIS logo retractable bag attach strap - HOLDS UP TO 15LBS
BÉIS embossed logo
top carry handle
side carry handle with weight limit indicator
TSA locks  For instructions see here.
expandable (expands to 12" ) with zipper puller that indicates which zipper expands the luggage
water resistant zipper tape
capacity 40LBS. **we recommend that you adhere to airlines guidelines, please check with your airline for weight limit restrictions

INTERIOR
butterfly opening (for easy packing/unpacking)
lined with durable, easy to spot clean, 75D (polyester) with soft brushed hand feel
U-zip flap, with contrast faux leather trim, includes one zip pocket & one frosted PVC zip pocket
detachable, compression flap with U-zip pocket and mesh packet
four point compression straps
zip pouch for keeping small valuables
separate pouch set for dirty clothes, shoes, under garments, damp clothing

PERFECT FOR
Travel
Air Travel
Carry on

entry.title: The 26" Check-In Roller in Grey
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type: Luggage
Price: 258.00

Description

WARNING: baggage claim is about to get chic! You're going places and our durable check-in rolling luggage is going to get all your stuff there! This smooth rolling 26" luggage holds everything you need without going over the baggage weight limit, thanks to the handy weight limit indicator that lets you know that your baggage may need to lose a few L-Bs! Two inches of optional expansion, compression flaps and straps with pockets galore, keep everything organized and ensure that the only organizing you will be doing on your trip is finding which restaurant serves the best pizza! TSA-approved combination lock is the cherry, and peace of mind, on top. Béis Limited Lifetime Luggage Warranty included.

entry.title: The ID Wristlet in Beige
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 18.00

Description
Just the  necessities - that is all there is room for in this anything but ordinary wristlet. Enough room for a couple cards, a clear window for your ID and a wristlet strap that you can wear or clip to a bag. This small but mighty must have accessory is perfect for travel or everyday use. 

 
Shay's Inspo

“This little wristlet may look small, but (much like the BÉIS team) small can be quite mighty! This little piece keeps all your essentials in one cute and compact place ensuring you can access everything you may need in a moment’s notice.” — Shay

 
Details
WRISTLET STRAP
Easy to carry or strap to a bag
CC SLOTS
For keeping it all together on-the-go.
ID SLOT
Always prepared to flash

entry.title: The ID Wristlet in Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 18.00

Description

Do you have trouble keeping all of your personal information together when you're traveling because of how many credit cards and IDs you have? BÉIS has created just the wallet for you.

Just the necessities - we help you set your priorities with a minimal approach for in this simply chic and sleek black wristlet wallet. This signature product was designed with enough room for a couple of credit cards, a clear view window for your ID card along with a wrist strap that you can wear to add the wallet and your everyday essentials, or clip it to a cute handbag. This small but mighty must-have accessory is perfect for travel or everyday use.

 
Shay's Inspo

“This little black wristlet may look small, but (much like the BÉIS team) small can be quite mighty! This little piece keeps all your essentials in one cute and compact place ensuring you can access everything you may need in a moment’s notice.” — Shay

 
Details
WRISTLET STRAP
Easy to carry or strap to a bag
CREDIT CARD SLOTS
For keeping it all together on-the-go.
ID SLOT

entry.title: The Puffer Sling in Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 68.00

Description

BÉIS has created a crossbody sling bag perfect for everyday use when carrying all of your essentials! The Puffer Sling is an adjustable crossbody bag that was inspired from winter-wear trends to be an extension of your favorite winter coat, although still suitable year round. The adjustable padded shoulder strap and large main compartment make it easy to carry winter gear essentials, gym clothing and other smaller items like your cell phone, laptop, tablet, or credit cards.

The ability to pack everything you need in one accessible place for when you need it is a feature sometimes not prioritized in regular backpack designs. The sling backpack design distributes the weight of the shoulder bag across the chest and body evenly for extra protection, easing strain on your neck and back muscles. And with a durable polyester fabric, you can rest assured that your belongings will stay safe and dry from any wet conditions.
 
Shay's Inspo

“This is a new style for us, brought to life after I dreamt up my perfect bag for on the go. Sampled it, used it, loved it and here we are. This is a new style of bag for us. I used it and love it. One shoulder easy to use perfect for on the go.” — Shay

 
Details
PUFFED UP!
Cozy winter vibes - ready for your ski adventure
SIDE-ZIP COMPARTMENT
Everything has its place
ADJUSTABLE, PADDED SHOULDER STRAP
Multiple ways to carry

entry.title: The Puffer Duffle in Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 98.00

Description
If you're looking for a new winter shoulder bag that can carry all of your winter essentials effortlessly, you've found the perfect product. The Black Puffer Tote from BÉIS is a chic handbag that converges fashion and functionality to make the perfect sized edition to our tote collection and a purchase you won't regret. The Puffer Tote comes equipped with a water-resistant bottom compartment for all your wet ski gear, a padded laptop sleeve, and a hidden cell phone pocket, making winter adventures a piece of cake! 

 
Specifications

Dims: 19.75"W x 11.75"H x 11.75"D
Materials: Body: 100% polyester fabric
Trim: 100% saffiano PU
Lining 1: 100% 210D polyester
Lining 2: waterproof lining
Care: Spot clean
Weight: 2.4

 
Details
EXTERIOR
- Faux Saffiano Leather Trim
- Lightweight 'puffed' poly fabric body
- 1 exterior side slip pocket
- 1 front zipper pocket
- trolley sleeve
- Hand held straps
- Removable/Interchangeable adjustable strap
- Separate zipped shoe compartment

INTERIOR
- Key Fob
- Padded Laptop sleeve (fits up to a 13" macbook pro)
- 1 large clear zip pocket
- 3 mesh zip pockets
- Elasticized water bottle pocket

PERFECT FOR
Everyday
Work Days
Gym
Travel
Weekends
Carry-On

entry.title: The Puffer Duffle in Beige
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 98.00

Description
Designed to be noticed our ski-inspired duffle is enough to get you to the mountains and back - and anywhere in between. Whether you are hitting the slopes or heading out for an outdoor weekend adventure this puffy duffle is sure to keep you organized with an abundance of zip pockets, an exterior compartment for shoes or wet hat and gloves, padded sleeve for your laptop and multiple ways to carry.

 
Shay's Inspo

“This duffle is the newer, better version of our beloved first duffle (no shade to our OG). We added some features after learning what the first one was missing, and this bag now truly has it all. I love not only that it’s cute, round and chic, but because it fits into lockers, behind the seat of your car, or in the overhead compartment. Dope little bag, no doubt.” — Shay

 
Details
PUFFED UP!
Cozy winter vibes - ready for your ski adventure
U-SHAPE TOP ZIP
Easier to stuff your stuff.
TROLLEY PASSTHROUGH
Plays nice with roller bags.
SIDE-ZIP COMPARTMENT
PADDED LAPTOP SLEEVE 
Fits up to 13” laptop
Everything has its place.
CARRY-ON COMPLIANT
Tray tables, locked. Seatbacks, upright.

entry.title: The Puffer Tote in Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type: Shopping Totes
Price: 78.00

Description
Gear up for the winter season with The Puffy Tote. This perfect sized edition to our tote collection comes with all the winter fun necessities, including a water resistant bottom compartment for all your wet ski gear (or bathing suit if you’re not a snow bunny), a padded laptop sleeve and a hidden cell phone pocket - so documenting your adventures is never a task of hide & seek.

 
Shay's Inspo

“To me, this bag exemplifies the fabrication and highlights everything I love about this style. It’s perfectly shaped, sized and has features galore on the inside, too, to make it just as functional and is it fashionable.” — Shay

 
Details
PUFFED UP!
Cozy winter vibes - ready for your ski adventure
WATER RESISTANT BOTTOM COMPARTMENT
For your hat & gloves, shoes or bathing suit!
ADJUSTABLE, REMOVABLE SHOULDER STRAP
Multiple ways to carry
HIDDEN EXTERNAL POCKET
Because: phone & keys.
PADDED LAPTOP SLEEVE
Fits up to 15” laptop
TROLLEY PASSTHROUGH
Plays nice with roller bags.

entry.title: The 2-In-1 Backpack in Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 88.00

Description

Did you ever just want a bag that could do it all?! Something so modular in design that it could literally suit your every need and keep your hands free to text, hold a beverage, do cartwheels?!? Welp, here it is, a backpack with a removable front pouch that with the clip of a strap becomes a crossbody or acts as a seat back organizer when you are on the go! We know, we should have named this the everyday, everything, everywhere bag....
Specifications

Dims: 11.5"W x 6"D x 15.25"H
Materials: Body - Faux Leather/PU Lining - Polyester Strap - Faux Leather/PU Care: Spot Clean
Weight: 2.7lbs
Details

EXTERIOR
- padded shoulder straps
- padded laptop compartment on back
- trolley passthrough
- removable pouch with strap to convert it to a crossbody
- removable pouch can also be used as a seatback organizer
- large interior slip pocket
INTERIOR
- 2 interior slip pockets
- clear interior zipper pocket
- mesh elastic water bottle pocket
PERFECT FOR
Everyday
Work Days
Weekends

entry.title: The 26" Check-In Roller in Sakura Pink
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type: Luggage
Price: 232.00

Description

WARNING: baggage claim is about to get chic! You're going places and our durable check-in rolling luggage is going to get all your stuff there! This smooth rolling 26" luggage holds everything you need without going over the baggage weight limit, thanks to the handy weight limit indicator that lets you know that your baggage may need to lose a few L-Bs! Two inches of optional expansion, compression flaps and straps with pockets galore, keep everything organized and ensure that the only organizing you will be doing on your trip is finding which restaurant serves the best pizza! TSA-approved combination lock is the cherry, and piece of mind, on top. Béis Limited Lifetime Luggage Warranty included.
Shay's Inspo

"My priority with this launch was to create a well-designed, hard-sided piece of luggage that could also be expandable. I wanted it to be good-looking but also ultra-functional, which is why we included the compression straps and dividers with pockets; this not only make packing easy, but helps to keep you organized from point A to point B, and everywhere in-between. I’m also super excited about the “Dirt Bag," our built-in laundry bag that keeps your to-be-worn clothes separated from those that have already had an adventure."-Shay
Details

CHECK-IN SIZE LUGGAGE
Because more options.
WATER RESISTANT ZIPPER TAPE
Zip zip, with no drip. 
DURABLE HARDSIDED CONSTRUCTION
We don't crack under pressure.
HINOMOTO® 360 WHEELS 360°
Wheels for 365 travel.
CUSHIONED HANDLE
Pillows for your hands.
RETRACTABLE BAG ATTACH STRAP
Holds up to 15lbs and many ways to carry
SIDE CARRY HANDLE WITH WEIGHT INDICATOR
Goodbye overweight fees. 
TSA APPROVED LOCKS
Airport security on point. For instructions see here.
EXPANDS AN EXTRA 2"
Extra room for that just-in-case outfit.
DIRT BAG AND NOT BASIC DRAWSTRING BAG INCLUDED
Don't mix and match your daily clothes

The security line is a breeze with our carry-on-friendly roller, 360* smooth-rolling wheels make getting where you're going absolutely effortless. This piece will glide through the airports, streets and hallways so effortlessly that you may forget its there."-Shay

entry.title: The Travel Wallet in Black Patent
entry.summary:
Vendor: Beach House Group
Type: Luggage Accessories
Price: 38.00

Description

Need: a compact, sleek, good looking product to carry all your most important travel documents securely. Small enough to tuck into any pocket but also has a grab-and-go feature with multiple ways to carry. Answer: The Travel Wallet. Labeled organizational pockets that hold your currency, coins, passport, credit cards and boarding pass. A zipper that keeps it all together AND two straps so you can carry it any way you like!
Shay's Inspo

"The Travel Wallet is the perfect addition to any journey! It allows me to have all of my most important travel needs readily available and in one place to avoid having to dive into my big purse under pressure." - Shay Mitchell
Details

WRISTLET & CROSSBODY STRAPS
Multiple ways to carry.
ORGANIZATIONAL POCKETS
For keeping it all together on-the-go.
U-ZIP OPENING
Opens wide to see what's inside.
PEN HOLDER + PEN
No more asking your neighbor.
RFID-LINED
Safety first.

entry.title: The Seatback Organizer in Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Beach House Group
Type: Luggage Accessories
Price: 24.00

Description

Ever put your hand in the seat back pocket of a plane and come out with a mysterious sticky finger?! Not anymore! Our seatback pocket was designed to keep your travel essentials AND your hands free from the mystery of the seat back pocket! A couple slip pockets for smaller items, a long zip pocket in back for important travel documents and hidden magnets that 'lock' it in place. When you’re done, just fold it up and pack away. Bon voyage, germs!

 
Specifications

Dims: 5.5"H x 12.5"W
Materials:
Body - PU,
Trim- PVC, nylon zippers
Lining - Polyester
Care: Spot Clean
Weight: 1lb
Details

EXTERIOR
- easy to clean faux leather (PVC) material
- embossed BÉIS logo
INTERIOR
- hidden magnetic closure - to secure close or secure around seat-back pocket
- one long slip pocket (magazine, tablet, book)

entry.title: The Seatback Organizer in Beige
entry.summary:
Vendor: Beach House Group
Type: Luggage Accessories
Price: 24.00

Description

Ever put your hand in the seat back pocket of a plane and come out with a mysterious sticky finger?! Not anymore! Our seatback pocket was designed to keep your travel essentials AND your hands free from the mystery of the seat back pocket! A couple slip pockets for smaller items, a long zip pocket in back for important travel documents and hidden magnets that 'lock' it in place. When you’re done, just fold it up and pack away. Bon voyage, germs!

entry.title: The 29" Large Check-In Roller in Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Beach House Group
Type: Luggage
Price: 278.00

Description

WARNING: baggage claim is about to get chic! You're going places and our durable check-on rolling luggage is going to get all your stuff there! This smooth rolling 29" luggage holds everything you need without going over the baggage weight limit, thanks to the handy weight limit indicator that lets you know that your baggage may need to lose a few L-Bs! Two inches of optional expansion, compression flaps and straps with pockets galore, keep everything organized and ensure that the only organizing you will be doing on your trip is finding which restaurant serves the best pizza! TSA-approved combination lock is the cherry, and peace of mind, on top. Béis Limited Lifetime Luggage Warranty included.

entry.title: The Passport & Luggage Tag Set in Black Patent
entry.summary:
Vendor: Beach House Group
Type: Luggage Accessories
Price: 23.80

Description

What you need when you're on the go, full stop. A Passport Holder that acts as a mini wallet, a luggage tag to stylishly mark your territory, and a bonus clear pouch for all your last minute essentials and liquids. Feel like the most experienced traveler, even if it's your first flight!

 
Shay's Inspo

"This is an essential trio for any serious traveler. I wanted to have something to identify your precious luggage, and to protect one of our most important possessions - our passports - while traveling. The clear bag is perfect for tossing mini-bottles in to the weekender for easy grabbing at security." - Shay 
Details

4-PIECE SET
Ready, set, go.
CLEAR POUCH
3-1-1, here we come!
PEN HOLDER + PEN
No more asking your neighbor.
CARD HOLDER
Keep it together—just don’t lose it.

Baggage claim meets a bit of bling.
